error-login-id-required: {variant, select, email {Email} username {Username} other {Email or username}} is required
error-max-length: Expect string with length less than or equal to {expected, plural, one{# character} other{# characters}}
error-password-reset-failed: This reset password link is invalid, used or expired. Please request a new one.
error-duplicated-identity: This identity has been claimed by another user.
error-duplicated-authenticator: This authenticator already has been added.
error-remove-last-identity: Cannot disconnect. You need to keep at least 1 identity.
error-remove-last-primary-authenticator: Cannot remove. You need to keep at least 1 primary authenticator for an identity.
error-remove-last-secondary-authenticato: Cannot remove. Multi-factor authentication is required.
error-web-ui-invalid-session-retry:
This page has expired/invalid, maybe you have idled too long or switched your browser?

Please return and retry your request.
error-web-ui-invalid-session-return: This page is no longer active. Please return to the current page.
error-rate-limited: Please wait for a moment before retrying.
error-blocked-user: Your account is blocked from login.
error-network: There is a problem with the network.
public-signup-disabled-notice: Please contact the system administrator for creating new accounts.
create-device-token-label: Do not ask again on this device
login-id-placeholder: {variant, select, email {email} username {username} other {email or username}}
use-text-login-id-description: Use {variant, select, email {email} username {username} other {email or username}} instead
oob-otp-description: We have sent a {length}-character code to {target}. Please enter the code below to continue
verify-user-description: We have sent a {length}-character code to {target}. Please enter the code below to continue
verify-user-success-description: You have successfully verified your account.
password-policy-title: Your new password must follow the below rules:
password-policy-minimum-length: Minimum {length, plural, one{# character} other{# characters}}
password-policy-reuse: No reuse of {size, plural, one{# previous password} other{# previous passwords}} / previous password within {day, plural, one{# day} other{# days}}
forgot-password-email-description: Enter your email to request instruction to reset your password
forgot-password-send-to-email-descriptio: Request to send reset password instruction to the email below
forgot-password-phone-description: Enter your phone to request instruction to reset your password
forgot-password-send-to-phone-descriptio: Request to send reset password instruction to the phone below
forgot-password-success-description: If you have an account, please follow the instruction sent to {target} to reset your password
reset-password-description: Please enter your new password below.
reset-password-success-description: You have successfully reset your password. You can now sign in with it.
change-password-page-description: Please enter your new password below.
change-secondary-password-page-descripti: Please enter your new password below.
logout-button-hint: Click the button to sign out
settings-page-security-section-descripti: These can be used to make sure that it''s really you signing in.
settings-page-identity-section-descripti: Manage your list of connected identities
settings-page-recovery-code-description: These codes allow you to sign in even you lost access to your apps, devices, phones or email accounts.
settings-page-session-section-descriptio: View the list of the signed in sessions of your autenticated devices.
settings-identity-description: These are the login identities and third party services connected to your account for signing in
settings-sessions-description: Youâ€™re currently signed in to your account on these devices
settings-oob-otp-title: Channels for receiving verification code via SMS / Email
enter-login-id-page-description--change: Your current {key} is {displayID}. Please enter your new {key}.
setup-totp-get-google-authenticator-desc: If you don''t have any authenticator device / app, you can get the Google Authenticator App from Google Play Store or Apple App Store
setup-totp-use-google-authenticator-desc: In the App select Set up account. Choose Scan barcode
setup-totp-fallback-description: Can''t scan the barcode? Choose Manual entry. Enter your email address and this key: {secret} Make sure that Time based is turned on
setup-totp-code-description: Enter the 6-digit code that you see in the app / device
enter-totp-description: Enter the 6-digit code you see in the authenticator app / device
enter-totp-code-placeholder: 6-digit code from the authenticator app / device
recovery-code-storage-description: Keep these recovery codes somewhere safe but accessible
recovery-code-consumption-description: You can only use each code once
recovery-code-list-disabled: Listing recovery code is disabled by administrator
toc-pp-footer: By registering, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
